participant_1.name: Alex Johnson
participant_1.personality: Energetic and determined, Alex is passionate about fitness and helping others achieve their health goals.
participant_1.background: my parents were both very athletic. i got a new job just yesterday to be a life coach. i love running and preparing for marathons. i'm a clean eater.

participant_2.name: Jordan Smith
participant_2.personality: Laid-back and friendly, Jordan enjoys a balanced lifestyle and finds joy in working out and spending time with his dogs.
participant_2.background: i go to the gym regularly. i like doing the treadmill and rowing machine. i've short hair. two dogs live with me. eating is something i do when i am bored.
